title: JSON Schema for my JSON file format

name.description: The items's name. Defaults to Unset Name.

isTome.description: If the item is a tome that can be used for fast travel.

description.description: The item's description. Defaults to Unset Description.

requirements.description: The requirements to use this item.

skill.description: The required skill. Goes with SkillLevel or defaults to 0.

skillLevel.description: The skill level required. Goes with skill.

item.description: The name of the item required. Needs an itemAmount or defaults to 0.

itemAmount.description: The amount of item required. Defaults to 0.

action.description: The action required. Actions are enabled from items' ActionEnabled attribute.

location.description: The location requirement. Uses GameState.Location as a check.

quest.description: The name of the quest required. Goes with minimumQuestProgress and maximumQuestProgress, which default to 0 and int.MaxValue respectively.

areaUnlocked.description: The area that must be unlocked. If RequireAreaLocked is set to true, then it defines the area that must be locked instead.

lockedFollower.description: The name of the follower that must be locked.

requireAreaLocked.description: If set to true, this changes areaUnlocked to check for the opposite, if the area is locked.

minimumQuestProgress.description: The minimum progress that the quest must be. Defaults to 0.

maximumQuestProgress.description: The maximum progress that the quest must be. Defaults to int.maxValue.

value.description: The item's value. Defaults to 0. Usually refers to coins, but it can be any currency in a shop.

gatherSpeed.description: The speed in game ticks for the item to be gathered. Defaults to 10.

id.description: This value is set automatically when items are loaded. Do not set manually in json.

gatherSpeedBonus.description: The percent decrease in game ticks that this item provides for the skills it enables.

experienceGainBonus.description: The percent bonus to experience gain in the skill set in experienceBonusSkill.

experienceBonusSkill.description: The skill this item applies experienceGainBonus to.

experienceGained.description: The experience gained by gathering this skill. Format is Skill:Amount

openCraftingMenuText.description: Special text for a button that will take the player to the crafting menu.

category.description: This is set on game load and should not be set manually.

enabledActions.description: All the actions this item enables. Format doesn't matter, all checks use the string.Contains function.

gatherString.description: The string put in a message to the player when the item is gathered.

icon.description: The item's image in game. Defaults to Unset.

equipSlot.description: The slot this item can be equipped to. Defaults to None.

primaryColor.description: This is set per object group on load. Do not set manually.

secondaryColor.description: The color for the top left of the item icon. Defaults to lightgray. Can be any html color or hex value with #.

parameter.description: The parameter used for objects with the same name. Used in the uniqueID to make items unique.

isStackable.description: Sets the item to stackable. Defaults to false.

isSellable.description: Makes items sellable. Defaults to true, unless it's a questItem.

rerender.description: Used in rendering. Don't set in json.

armorInfo.description: The armor data of the item.

damage.description: The added damage of the item when worn.

armorBonus.description: The added armor bonus of the item when worn.

wearRequirements.description: The requirements to wear this item.

statusEffectData.description: The status effect this armor can cause.

name.description: The name of the effect. Must be set up in the BattleManager to function properly.

speed.description: The number of game ticks between procs of the effect. For example, poison may have a speed of 5 and hurt the opponent once every 5 game ticks.

duration.description: The number of procs before the effect wears off. An effect with a duration of 10 and speed of 2 will last 20 total game ticks.

message.description: The message the player sees when the effect procs.

procOdds.description: The odds on being hit that the effect with occur. Range of 0.001 to 0.999.

power.description: The strength of the effect. Some effects don't use Power, others do. Depends on the effect.

selfInflicted.description: Determines whether the effect happens to the user or the opponent. Defaults to false (Opponent).

attackSpeed.description: The speed in gameticks of the weapon.

foodInfo.description: The food data of the item.

healAmount.description: The amount the item heals per heal tick.

healDuration.description: The number of heals per item eaten.

healSpeed.description: The number of game ticks between heals. Default is 5.

buffAmount.description: The amount the item buffs the BuffedSkill.

TrapInfo.description: The trap data of the item.

timeToReady.description: The number minutes it takes for the trap to be ready to harvest. Default is 90.

size.description: The amount of animals caught per trapping.

tanningInfo.description: The tanning data of the item.

tansIntoString.description: The name of the item this item tans into.
